data.name: SpellForce 2 - Faith in Destiny - Digital Extras
data.detailed_description:
Spell Force Digital Extras Includes:
  • Faith in Destiny Soundtrack
  • WorldMap in digital form
  • Artworks Booklet in digital form

Digital Extra Content will be placed in your Spell Force 2 - Faith in Destiny folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Spellforce 2 - Faith in Destiny\Digital Extras

English*, French*, German*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Win XP, Vista, Win7
  • Processor:Intel Pentium ® IV 1.5 GHz
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:3D graphics card with 128 MB RAM (compatible with GeForce 4 Ti or higher)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:5 GB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Win XP, Vista, Win7
  • Processor:Intel Pentium ® IV 2.5 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:3D graphics card with 256 MB RAM (compatible with GeForce 6600 GT or higher)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:5 GB HD space
